modName: Brokefoot UNP Mashup with Temptress - BBP Patch
summary: This is simply a patch for Brokefoot's UNP Mashup and Temptress armors to give the armor BBP support.
descriptionHtml:
8/7/2012 - Added Temptress, Scamps Iron Armor, and fixed a clipping issue with Vicky's bra while wearing temptress accessories. Should be the last update unless there are any severe bugs or clipping. I do recommend keeping the original Scamps Iron Armor however. It seems a little silly when iron armor is jiggling like that, but I've included it for completeness.

This is simply a patch for Brokefoot's UNP Mashup to give the armor BBP support. If you notice any clipping or other issues, let me know so I can get them fixed.

You must have turbodance's UNP BBP installed:
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/21199]http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/21199[/url]

And have Brokefoot's mod installed: [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/20415]http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/20415[/url]
All credit goes to him for his amazing armor, I just spent a few minutes to make them jiggle.

NMM and Wrye Bash Ready.

Thanks to the great modders for making this possible:
Dimon99 for his UNP Body: [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/6709]http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/6709[/url]
CherryHotaling for giving up jiggly boobs: [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/4888]http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/4888[/url]
turbosundance for his UNP BBP Modding Resources: [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/21196]http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/21196[/url]
And again Brokefoot for making these great armors: [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/20415]http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/20415[/url]
author: ServantOfSin
